PasswordMinLength: Password must be at least {8} characters
UsernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
UsernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores
AtLeastOneFieldRequired: At least one field must be provided for update
InvalidGenderValue: Invalid gender value. Allowed values: Male, Female, Other, Prefer not to say
FirstNameTooShort: First name must be at least 2 characters
LastNameTooShort: Last name must be at least 2 characters
PasswordUppercaseRequired: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter (A-Z)
PasswordLowercaseRequired: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter (a-z)
PasswordDigitRequired: Password must contain at least one digit (0-9)
PasswordSpecialCharRequired: Password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*)
PasswordsDoNotMatch: Password and confirmation do not match
AddressTooShort: Address must be at least 5 characters
DoB: DateofBirth must be in the past
TermsNotAccepted: You must accept the terms and conditions
PasswordSameAsCurrent: New password cannot be the same as current password
PasswordHistoryViolation: You cannot use a previously used password
PasswordComplexityError: Password does not meet complexity requirements
TooManyPasswordAttempts: Too many password attempts, try again later
PasswordChangeNotAllowed: Password change not allowed at this time
InvalidTokenLength: Token must be at least 32 characters

EmailConfirmation.Subject: Confirm your email
EmailConfirmation.Title: Email Confirmation
EmailConfirmation.Message: Thank you for registering with us. Please click the button below to confirm your email address.
EmailConfirmation.Footer: If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.

PasswordReset.Subject: Password Reset
PasswordReset.Title: Reset Your Password
PasswordReset.Message: You have requested to reset your password. Please click the button below to set a new password.
PasswordReset.Footer: This link will expire in {0} hours.

WelcomeEmail.Subject: Welcome to Our Service
WelcomeEmail.Title: Welcome {0}!
WelcomeEmail.Message: Thank you for joining us. We're excited to have you in our community.
WelcomeEmail.Footer: If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.

AccountDeactivation.Subject: Account Deactivation Notice
AccountDeactivation.Title: Account Deactivated
AccountDeactivation.Message: Your account has been deactivated. It will be permanently deleted on {0}.
AccountDeactivation.Footer: If you wish to recover your account, please contact us before the deletion date.

AccountReactivation.Subject: Account Reactivated
AccountReactivation.Title: Account Reactivation
AccountReactivation.Message: Your account has been successfully reactivated. You can now login using your credentials.
AccountReactivation.Footer: Thank you for using our service.

Roles.UserDoesNotHaveRole: User does not have this role
Roles.RoleHasUsers: Cannot delete role because it has assigned users
Roles.AssignRoleFailed: Failed to assign role {0} to user {1}. Errors: {2}
Roles.RemoveRoleFailed: Failed to remove role {0} from user {1}. Errors: {2}
Roles.PermissionAlreadyAssigned: This permission is already assigned to the role.
Roles.PermissionAddedSuccessfully: Permission has been successfully added to the role.
Roles.PermissionNotFound: The specified permission for the role was not found.
Roles.PermissionRemovedSuccessfully: Permission has been successfully removed from the role.
Roles.PermissionUpdatedSuccessfully: Permission has been successfully updated for the role.

Validation.RoleNameMinLength: Role name must be at least {0} characters
Validation.RoleNameInvalidChars: Role name can only contain letters, numbers, spaces and underscores
Validation.ConsecutiveSpaces: Role name cannot contain consecutive spaces
Validation.InvalidOrganizationIdFormat: Organization ID must be a valid GUID
Validation.CategoryNameMinLength: Category name must be at least {0} characters
Validation.CategoryAlreadyExists: Category with this name already exists
Validation.InvalidDuration: Duration must be a positive number
